nodes.text: Barid Mesoriaam was a high-ranked male Human agent of the Corellian Resistance. He was one of the few who had Bria Tharen's personal communicator code.

In 0 BBY, Mesoriaam was captured by Jabba the Hutt and imprisoned in his Mos Eisley town house. Jabba's men tortured Mesoriaam for information on the Rebel Alliance. Mesoriaam was found by Muftak and Kabe, who had broken into Jabba's mansion. He offered them 30,000 credits for rescuing a datadot (that he used to hide behind his teeth) and giving it an unidentified Mon Calamari.
